name: Beggars Pass
description:
As an adventurer, you do enjoy a run through the dungeons. With the holidays soon upon you, the other adventurers are off relaxing. It has left the dungeons open for the looting.

But something strange is afoot with outside getting colder, the local beggars have moved in to keep warm.

I am sure a few coins here and there will help them in this season of giving.

Story intro done... A dungeon explorer game, with emphasize on helping those around you. You kill enemies get gold, either spend, gamble or give the gold to beggars to accumulate karma points. I wanted a system where you could spend karma to get upgrades, but time was short and the base of the mechanics are in.

I had hoped to make this entire game with only assets I made, but I am terrible at fires in unity, well in game development as a whole. So everything is made by me except the fire which I got off for free off the unity asset store.

I apologize for my terrible voice acting within the game. But I do hope you enjoy what I have made here. Might need to improve on this concept at some point in the future.

The modifiers I was going for were the High roller modifier which is the gambler/dungeon master hidden in a room who you can play dice with, only a simple variation of dice again time. Also the Foleyship modifier, all sound effects were made by me and various objects on my desk.
